pages.text: There may be a line of food icons in certain items' tooltip. That means $(em)this item is a valid raw ingredient in Cuisine Mod$(). $(br2)Different icon represents different $(em)categories$() that this ingredient belongs to. Each icon means it can restore 1 food value (half shank) when being cooked as a part of dish. When $(l:https://github.com/WesCook/Nutrition)Nutrition Mod$() is present, each icon also means that it will restore corresponding nutrution value by 0.5; if the category is " supernatural", each icon means that it will restore every nutrition value by 0.1.

Golden outline indicates the amount of food value it will restore. The actual value dpeneds on ingredients and cooking process itself.$(br2)Generally speaking, $(em)the more categories an ingredient has$(), the better that ingredient is (overall).
